collation.cr: [import und-u-co-search] ‎&׳ # 05F3 HEBREW PUNCTUATION GERESH, ignorable <<'' # APOSTROPHE, Hebrew-specific addition, should match GERESH ‎&״ # 05F4 HEBREW PUNCTUATION GERSHAYIM, ignorable <<'\"' # QUOTATION MARK, Hebrew-specific addition, should match GERSHAYIM

[normalization on] [reorder Hebr] &[before 2]''<<׳ # GERESH just before APOSTROPHE (secondary difference) &[before 2]'\"'<<״ # GERSHAYIM just before QUOTATION MARK (secondary difference) &ב<בֿ &ו<<וּ<<וו<<וי &י<<יִ<<יי<<ײַ &[before 1]כ<כּ &[before 1]פ<פּ &פֿ<<<ף &ש<שׂ &[before 1]ת<תּ
